attributes.action: Make licence Fees Free to all Residental and care homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgrace that our old and sick people in residential care homes are having to sit all day and night without the privledge of a television in their rooms its also a disgrace that the owners of these homes are being forced to pay hundreds of pounds over and above the already over priced TV Licence for all rooms set out for respite care or face fines of £1000, some if not all of these people who enter respite already have TV Licences in their own homes or qualify for the disgressonary Licence fees anyway. what on earth is this country comming to when we treat our sick and old in this way. Something has to be done and done now.
